dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: By reconditioning the Resistance weapon, you can redistribute the attribute points allocated to your weapon.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text:
Reapplication of aetheroinsulation coating requires [#2] phials of aetherial sealant.
House of Splendors representatives are standing by, and ready to take your order!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Aetherial sealant can be obtained from Auriana at Revenant's Toll or Hismena at Idyllshire.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: By supplying the Allagan node with aetherial sealant, you may raise the four available attributes of your Resistance weapon as you see fit.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: When you are satisfied with the allotment of attributes, select Allocate to complete the process.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Choose carefully, as redistribution of attributes will require the procurement of additional sealant.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> <blip> Unable to process request. Insufficient aetherial sealant.

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> <blip> Unable to process request. Incompatible weapon detected. Please verify the correct weapon is equipped before placing next request.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may only recondition your currently equipped Resistance weapon when accessing the Allagan node.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Recondition your presently equipped Resistance weapon?

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text: <blip> Suspending weapon recondition protocol. Entering standby mode...

dialogue.name: MEMORIZESYSTEM
dialogue.text:
<blip> Scanning registry... Readying memories for extraction...
<blip> <blip> Reapplying aetheroinsulation coating...
Reconditioning protocol complete.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Resistance weapon has been transformed, gaining newfound strength!
